Pre-Game Insights: Martinique will play host to Guyana at Stade Municipal Pierre-Aliker in the CONCACAF Nations League on Monday.
Martinique maintained their League A status in the previous edition and are yet to play in a lower division since they entered the competition in 2019-20.
Martinique opened their campaign in Group A with a 3-1 defeat to Guatemala in an away fixture.
Guyana earned promotion to League A for the first time in the previous edition following a flawless campaign that saw them winning all five matches.
Guyana lost their Group A opening game at home 3-1 against Suriname.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Martinique have won four times and lost once in their last five matches at home.
Martinique have scored four goals and conceded four in their last five matches in all competitions.
Martinique have played 12 matches in this competition, winning twice, drawing five times and losing five times while Guyana have played 17 (W11, D2, L4).
Guyana have won once and lost four times in their last five matches on the road.
Martinique have won twice, drawn twice and lost once in their last five matches while Guyana have won once and lost four times.
